```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
```

```{r}
datsign <- read_excel("../data/ATbac samples.xlsx") %>%
  rename("sample.name" = "Sample Name",
         "sequence.id" = "Name")
```

# Chuck excess, write guess
```{r}
met <- datsign %>%
  select(sample.name, sequence.id) %>%
  separate(sequence.id, into = c("sequence.id"), sep = "-") 

met <- met[!duplicated(met),] %>%
  mutate(BMI = ifelse(grepl("L", sample.name), "Lean", ifelse(grepl("Neg", sample.name), NA, "Obese")))
```


```{r}
write.csv(met, "../data/samples_obesity-status.csv", row.names = F)
```
